snippet.title: The Last Worker - Exclusive Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2022
snippet.description:
Protagonist Kurt needs a certain kind of break but just can't seem to find one in this trailer of The Last Worker. This narrative adventure explores what happens as humans are replaced by robots at a shipping warehouse in an end-stage capitalist environment. The Last Worker launches in 2022 for PC, PS5, Xbox Series X|S, Switch, and VR.

#IGN #IGNSummerofGaming
